input: Sentence: Lilly and her father Andrew are playing catch in the back. Lilly is not as strong as her father. Question: Who has trouble tossing the ball far? (A) Lilly (B) Andrew
Sentence: The Williams twins, Joe and Jim are playing hockey. Joe is getting really sweaty but Jim is barely perspiring. Question: Which of them is getting more of a work out? (A) Jim (B) Joe
Sentence: John and Jack are in a dead lifting competition. John has a strong powerful back and Jack has a thin weak back. Question: Who will dead lift the least amount of weight? (A) Jack (B) John
